titleStmt.title: A sermon on the decease of Mr. Hanserd Knollis, minister of the Gospel Preached at Pinners-Hall, Octob. 4. 1691. By Tho. Harrison.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, fl. 1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Barnard, at the Bible in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London.
